titleStmt.title: Practical Christianity, or, An account of the holinesse which the Gospel enjoyns with the motives to it and the remedies it proposes against temptations, with a prayer concluding each distinct head.
titleStmt.author: Lucas, Richard, 1648-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. and B.G. for R. Pawlet,
